txt.en:
'You might have heard mention of this around town already, but if you haven't: there are goblins at Tûm Fuin, a hollow a short distance north of Ost Forod!

'We have enough problems with the Wargs and tomb-robbers stirring up trouble in Tyrn Fornech; we don't need goblins and boggarts as well!

'I have set aside some coins for any adventurer able enough to do something about the goblins. Are you such an adventurer, [placeholder]? If so, you'll have no trouble journeying north to Tûm Fuin and defeating the goblins there!'

'Tûm Fuin sounds dreadful, [placeholder]! I am glad you were able to defeat some of the goblins there, but I don't know if the hollow will ever be the pretty place that once it was. The corruption the goblins have wrought sounds severe.\n\n'Take this reward, [placeholder], and let us both wish for the day that Tûm Fuin will be restored.'

'The goblins are at Tûm Fuin, [placeholder], a hollow to the north of Ost Forod, among the hills of Tyrn Fornech. It is to the north-east of the Duskencleft, if you have ever been to that pass between the hills.'
'Tûm Fuin was a place of beauty before the goblins came.'
Poppy Seaton is distressed by the fact that goblins have taken up residence so near to Ost Forod and wants something done about them.
'One day, Tûm Fuin will be restored.'
Goblins have made a camp at Tûm Fuin, north of Ost Forod in Tyrn Fornech.\n\nPoppy Seaton has asked you to do something about the goblins that have taken up residence at Tûm Fuin.
Poppy Seaton is at Ost Forod, the old watch-post in the hills of Tyrn Fornech, south of Tûm Fuin.\n\nYou have defeated many goblins and should now return to Poppy with news of your victory.
